website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX3212 SVGA 3LCD Projector offers a reasonably bright, high-quality data image, a relatively light weight, and a budget price.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quality product to make professional presentations. I am not working so I needed something that I could purchase that would not break me but that would show my potential clients that I meant business. This product is it. I researched for months and read a little over 50 reviews and went with this projector. It exceeded my expectations. I even used it for a 3 day weekend seminar for over 500 people. She ran great and had a clear picture in a lighted hotel conference room. I am utterly satisfied thus far. I have been using it for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Golden21

customer_reviews.title: I love my projector
customer_reviews.text: I love my projector. I have had it for about five years now with absolutely no problem. It works well for the purpose I bought it. I use it to project images, videos, and do PowerPoint presentations etc. in a classroom setting and so far, it has exceeded my expectations. I would recommend buying one of these.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Years of Use Now!
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this projector. I purchased it when I knew I was going to host a 100 person conference in a hotel and what they hotel was going to charge for 1 day rental bought me this dynamo!. We had the lights ON and it was still very bright. It is easy to set up and has taken some banging around! I would highly recommend this projector to anyone looking to replace a hotel's rental fee in medium large room for front projection. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dori Friend

customer_reviews.title: Issue with heat and color
customer_reviews.text: Tends to overheat, even the air coming out of the fan is too hot when getting closer. Colors not great.
customer_reviews.author: Abdoulaye Seck

customer_reviews.title: Epson projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector, it makes using powerpoint presentations and videos a snap for my classroom. The only problem I have had is that I need more volume for the videos, I am looking for external speakers that will conect to it.
customer_reviews.author: auntmom

customer_reviews.title: Portability & Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Initially had problems with the Quick start DVD. Would not load on Win8. However, the setup was easy and quick. I used HDMI connection to my laptop. The adjustments were very easy to follow to center on projector screen and focus. Overall I am very satisfied with the model I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epson EX3210
customer_reviews.text: This projector does everything as advertised. It is simple to use and has many nice features. I had a problem with the remote but the support department was real helpful and they ended up finding out that I had a bad remote and sent me out a new one by Fed-ex. Took care of the issue in a timely manner with not hassles.
customer_reviews.author: TNnewbee

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to purchase a projector be sure to get an Epson. They are the leading manufacturers of projector. I am very happy with my projector. The model I bought is now unavailable. Getting a replacement lamp is no problem. The lamp for my projector is also used in other Epson projectors. I highly recommend getting an Epson projector. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome L. Acuff

customer_reviews.title: You'll Like This One
customer_reviews.text: Use this to do media presentations at church. Works great. Please with the image quality. It has a lot of features for an entry level projector.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY HARTWIG

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Had previously purchased something very similar and lost it. It's light, looks great, works perfectly. It is just the thing to take along to client presentations. The quality of the display is very good. Very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: masandra1026

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector as a replacement unit for one at church. Clarity and color are great. We have it ceiling mounted and it responds beautifully to the computer and the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Church. The light is plenty bright and the driver loaded almost instantly. We're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good projector
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses the projector for public speaking engagements. It is very easy to set up. Very user friendly. It is holding up very good after many miles and many (16) different locations in the last 2 1/2 months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Michael Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Presentation Tool
customer_reviews.text: This projector has the power to display in a fully lit room- it exceeded my expectations. It has HDMI, so connecting it to my iPad with the Apple adapter worked perfectly for my presentations. I also love the auto correct keystone feature. This machine is also very simple to use. I used the other customer reviews to help me decide which model to purchase and found them very helpful and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Fred the computer guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, product arrived without any problem, it is very good quality and price, I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Juan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super bright. Would never know it was refurbished. Price was half that of a new machine and prefers like a new machine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of features and projects nicely but...
customer_reviews.text: the power plug loses it's contact with the machine with even the slightest movement. This could be a defect isolated to the one I got, so i do not know if this is the case for all of them. It is nice and compact and easy to use and if not for the power cord issue, I would have given it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: H.O.P.E. for Animals

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good buy. I bought it for my classroom presentation ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good buy. I bought it for my classroom presentation and i'm very please with its performance. It is very light and easy to carry around. I recommend it to any one seeking a projector for presentation purposes.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1 - Then Bought 4 More
customer_reviews.text: We run educational events every month and we love this projector. Our speakers show up with their presentation on a USB and we are ready to roll. They are lightweight and come with a carrying case with shoulder strap. Couldn't be more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Simplified hookup make my presentation "outstanding".
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to make a presentation from my ipad. I am new to ipad and new to this projector. Simplified hookup make my presentation "outstanding". What more can be said.
customer_reviews.author: Harold K.

customer_reviews.title: Remote could be better
customer_reviews.text: Plug and plan worked without a hitch. Good picture , easy to use except for remote. No lazer pointer and the up/down feature for advancing through the slides is acquard. Case is flimsly but servicable. Would recomend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what we generally need it for. It could be a tad clearer without so much fussing with the dial.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific projector
customer_reviews.text: Using the projector both indoors and out in a Florida State Park. It has served admirably, doing a far better job than its predecessor ever did. Good, bright, clear picture from all sources. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far, and it worked wonderful. The only draw back I can see is the speakers are not very loud, and external speakers will be needed.
customer_reviews.author: WCCSD

customer_reviews.title: I used for 2 weeks and bulb got burned, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used for 2 weeks and bulb got burned, sent an email and product back to the buyer there was no response....
customer_reviews.author: venu g aluri

customer_reviews.title: Children's church
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a ceiling mount which was a little pricey but the projector is awesome and way better than our last one. Can see everything on the screen with the windows still open and sunlight streaming in.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is a USB adapter for hooking it to the computer. Easy to use the first time setting it up in the office. When I received it I was surprised how large it seemed but was pleasantly shocked how light the unit is. This will be a great addition to the office.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: I saw a video that someone submitted about this projector either on amazon or on the Staples website. If you can watch that, the guy nails it. I would recommend this projector to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: asntdr01

customer_reviews.title: I am Pleased
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant find a better projector. Set up was a little tricky. it's not the top of the line, but it works great for what I need it for. Works good for a medium sized dark room home theater. I have spent more on other projectors that don't work as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: EZOD COMM

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector for use in a meeting hall that has a lot of light in it. Even with the curtains open on a bright day, and all of the lights on, the image is easy to see! I am really impressed with the quality of the image displayed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra A. Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Epson EX3210 Projector
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!! Everything it advertised that it was . Light weight and super easy to set up. Surprised at the cost.Works better than a $1200.oo projector I borrowed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, it arrived at my overseas location early and is what I expected. I use it for both work and entertainment. I have had many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: PLD

customer_reviews.title: Projector
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to operate. If you are in need of a projector i would highly recommend the Epson EX3212
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to buy , many costumiers buying with my services this brand , i only wish to get good services such this
customer_reviews.author: Ganiber

customer_reviews.title: Meeting the mark
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so happy with this!!! He says its made his presentations more alive and interactive. . . . thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: The purchase was successful. The product was delivered on time and in perfect condition. The packaging of a good size and the protected equipment. The video beam purchased is of excellent quality, perfect for my work, good size and perfect shine. I recommend the product purchased. Excellent seller, responsible and very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I boght a Epson EX3210 Projector, it is very well. The collor are flesh, the screen adjusting are simple and eazy. And cables conecting are easy too. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Sigi

customer_reviews.title: Great portable LCD
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works fine for our backup at presentations and beats having to rent one. I I am not using it very often so cannot vouch for it being used lots
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this projector , this purchase was an excellet choice , Ilike the color and the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Jaime Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very affordable. Easy to use and minimal set up required. Would recommend for anyone teaching or needing a nice projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Supported formats
customer_reviews.text: When using a USB device, such as a flash drive, only the following formats are supported: jpg, bmp, gif, and png. It does not support pps powerpoint slideshow files.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy

customer_reviews.title: I plan to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: I run A/V for monthly meetings and conferences in rooms with 100+ attendees, the Epson EX3212 does the job perfectly, and I can carry it like a laptop!
customer_reviews.author: TX Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Yes..........better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for outlining subjects or for teaching aid You can also hook it up to your labtop and watch netflix on the wall whatever size you want
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent , easy to use ,the price is unbelievable , light weight , highly recommend that projector... Nice and perfect
customer_reviews.author: excellent

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Set up was very simple and my computer recognized the device instantly. It was the best option for our limited budget.
customer_reviews.author: K.Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: One of the best projectors out there. It was a 16:9 ratio and 4:3 ration build in. Love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for medium range projector
customer_reviews.text: Really saves you money if you host a lot of meetings. Great picture and not to bulky. A business professional must have.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Tremellen

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector for my wife's business. It is light, easy to use, works well and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Galbreath

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent. I recommended. The color is nice, it works perfect with the light. It isn't heavy. The price is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Mauren Saboío

customer_reviews.title: BUENO, EXCELENTE PRODUCTO
customer_reviews.text: ELIGE EL PRODUCTO POR SER UNA BUENA MARCA POR LAS ALTERNATIVAS EN DIFERENTES MODALIDADES DE USO, EXCELENTE PRODUCTO. ME PARECE JUSTO PRECIO VALOR
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR A. CORDOVA E.

product_meta.title: Epson EX3212 Projector (Portable SVGA 3LCD, 2800 lumens color brightness, 2800 lumens white brightness, HDMI, rapid setup)
product_meta.description:
Style:HDMISpectacular Presentations Made Easier. The easy-to-use EX3212 offers exceptional performance and versatility. Delivering 2800 lumens of color brightness and 2800 lumens of white brightness (light output)1, using Epson's 3 LCD, 3-chip technology, it projects brilliant images with true-to-life color. Epson's intuitive control features like USB Plug and Play instant setup and our new, breakthrough horizontal image correction with convenient, easy-slide control, make setting up your presentation simple. Plus, the EX3212 features HDMI connectivity for an additional digital input. The EX3212 also offers the flexibility to present JPEG slideshows from any thumb drive or USB memory device, without a computer. The EX3212 is the smart choice for the savvy professional. When you're ready to step up your game, the EX3212 will be ready for you.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


EX3212 SVGA 3LCD PROJECTOR
view larger Spectacular Presentations Made Easier.

 * 3x Brighter Colors, and reliable performance — 3LCD, 3-chip technology
 * One measurement of brightness is not enough — look for both high color brightness and high white brightness. The EX3212 has:
 *  Color Brightness: 2800 lumens (color light output)
 *  White Brightness: 2800 lumens (white light output)
 * SVGA resolution (800 x 600)
 * 3LCD, 3-chip technology
 * HDMI all-digital connectivity
 * Easy-slide image correction
 * USB Plug ‘n Play instant setup
 * E-TORL lamp — up to 5000 hrs
 * Remote control included
 * Carrying case included

Epson offers a wide range of high-quality projectors to meet almost any need. Built with image quality and reliability in mind, Epson projectors enhance communication and inspire collaboration, while offering a low total cost of ownership. From ultraportable projectors designed for educational settings to boardroom-ready business projectors, Epson has a model that’s perfect for you.

 * All 3LCD projectors have both high color brightness and high white brightness
 * All 3LCD projectors have 3 chips
 * 25% lower power consumption for lower energy costs
 * 20 years of road-tested reliability

HORIZONTAL IMAGE CORRECTION WITH THE NEW EASY-SLIDE CONTROL
Epson’s horizontal and vertical image (keystone) correction means you can project a rectangular image from almost any angle. The EX3212 automatically corrects the image vertically. And, for horizontal image correction, just move the easy-slide control bar to make the necessary adjustments. Your EX3212 can be off to the side and above or below the screen, while your presentation is front and center.

view larger 3X BRIGHTER COLORS WITH EPSON
Brilliant image quality requires high color brightness (color light output), and Epson 3LCD projectors have 3x Brighter Colors than leading competitive projectors.

One brightness measurement (lumens) is not enough. A projector‘s specification needs to show both high color brightness and high white brightness. If color brightness is lower than white brightness, images may be dark, dull and lose detail. If not provided, be sure to ask for a projector’s color brightness specification.

Get consistent, true-to-life color with Epson, whether you’re projecting images with deep, dark colors or a white screen with text.

HIGH-QUALITY IMAGES WITH HDMI DIGITAL CONNECTIVITY
 * Delivers both audio and brilliant video content with just one cable
 * Compatible with the latest laptops, Blu-ray and media players

ADVANCED USB PLUG ‘N PLAY INSTANT SETUP FROM YOUR PC OR MAC
Epson’s advanced USB connectivity enables instant Plug ‘n Play setup for both audio and video. Forget about complicated computer key sequences and non-intuitive controls. Instead, just plug in a standard USB cable and let your presentation impress the audience.

ENERGY-EFFICIENT E-TORL LAMP
The innovative E-TORL lamp, exclusively from Epson, is a reliable performer that delivers more lumens per watt and lasts up to 5000 hours. The special E-TORL design minimizes both light diffraction and light leakage, providing you the ultimate in lamp longevity. And, when it's time to replace the lamp, Epson offers an affordable solution with genuine Epson lamps.

FAST, EASY SETUP AND CONTROL
 * Amazing image quality — native SVGA (800 x 600) resolution
 * HD quality with just one cable — digital HDMI audio/video connection
 * PC-free slideshows — via a USB thumb drive
 * The ultimate in portability — compact, lightweight design; carrying case and remote control included
 * Filters to protect your investment — with easy side access for hassle-free maintenance
 * Dimensions (W x D x H) — Including feet: 11.6" x 9.0" x32.1", Excluding feet: 11.6" x 9.0" x 3.0" and Weight 5.1 lb

ENERGY-EFFICIENT FEATURES
 * Energy-efficient 3LCD light engine
 * Energy-efficient E-TORL lamp
 * Recyclable product

QUICK, CONVENIENT CONTROL
The EX3212 features Instant Off/On, so no warm-up or cool-down time is required. The A/V Mute Slide instantly pauses the presentation to bring the focus back to the presenter. And, the energy-efficient Sleep Mode decreases your overall cost of ownership.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * EX3212 Projector
 * Power cable
 * Computer cable (VGA)
 * Projector remote control with batteries
 * USB cable
 * Soft carrying case
 * User manual CD
 * Quick Setup Sheet
 * PrivateLine support card
 * Registration card and password protection sticker
feature_bullets: SVGA resolution (800 x 600); Easy-slide horizontal image correction
USB Plug 'n Play instant setup; HDMI connectivity; Apple Mac compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars87 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
